summary: Adds a library just outside of the riverwood gate. Includes a merchant that sells books.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod adds a library just outside of riverwood. It is fully navmeshed and includes a merchant that will sell books.
 It should be compatible with most mods, although it might be incompatible with mods that alter the area outside of riverwood.
I also plan on making some more mods adding library\'s to other places.
PLANS:
More bookshelfs and books in the library
Better navmesh
Staircase or other thing to make getting to the place easier.
NOTE: The main reason the interior is dark is because i have the mod Project reality climates of tamriel and it modifies the lighting.
There are also a few custom books in the library found no where else.
author: xZEUS99x
